login.title: Log in
login.subtitle: Sign in with your credentials to continue.

register.title: Register
register.subtitle: Create your Prismateams account.
register.password_help: At least 12 characters including uppercase, lowercase, numbers and symbols.
register.dark_mode_help: You can change this setting anytime in your profile.

confirm_email.title: Confirm email
confirm_email.subtitle: Enter the verification code we have sent to you.
confirm_email.info_message: The code is valid for 15 minutes. Please also check your spam folder.
confirm_email.code_help: You can find the code in the email with the subject "Confirm email".
confirm_email.warning_message: Without a confirmed email address only limited features are available.

setup.success_body: Welcome to your team portal! You can now add more users via the settings.

update.title: Update available!
update.description: A new update is available on the main branch on GitHub.

edit.heading: Edit Dashboard
edit.subtitle: Customize your dashboard to match your preferences.

widgets.title: Widgets
widgets.description: Choose which widgets should appear on your dashboard.

dateien.label: Recent Files
dateien.description: Shows the files you edited most recently.

canvas.label: Canvas
canvas.description: Shows the canvases you edited most recently.

neue_wikieintraege.label: New Wiki Entries
neue_wikieintraege.description: Shows the latest edited or created wiki entries.

meine_wikis.label: My Wikis
meine_wikis.description: Shows up to five of your favorite wiki entries.

meine_ausleihen.label: My Loans
meine_ausleihen.description: Shows your active loans from inventory with due status.

quick_access.title: Quick access
quick_access.description: Choose which links should appear in the quick access panel.

appearance.heading: Customize appearance
appearance.language_help: Choose the language for the interface and system messages.
appearance.oled_help: Uses true black (#000000) for OLED displays. Requires dark mode.
appearance.flash_invalid_language: The selected language is not available.

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Adjust accent colour, language and dark mode

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Push notifications for chat, files, email and calendar

about.title: About
about.description: Information about Prismateams, version and creator

profile.heading: Edit profile

picture.remove_confirm: Do you really want to remove the profile picture?

picture.error_type: Only JPG, PNG and GIF files are allowed.
picture.error_size: The file is too large. Maximum size: 5MB.

notifications.heading: Notifications
notifications.master_help: Receive notifications even when the app is closed

password.heading: Change password
password.label: New password (optional)

profile.flash_password_length: The password must be at least 8 characters long.

profile.flash_picture_invalid_type: Invalid file type. Only PNG, JPG, JPEG and GIF files are allowed.

permissions.title: Browser permissions
permissions.description: These permissions are required so the app can use all features.

push.title: Push notifications
push.description: Server-side notifications for chat, files and email

microphone.title: Microphone access
microphone.description: Required for voice messages in chat

app.title: App installation
app.description: Install the app on your device for better notifications

status.title: Push notification status
status.info_message: You receive push notifications even when the browser is closed. The system runs on the server and does not rely on local polling.
status.https_warning: Important: Push notifications only work over HTTPS. They are not available via HTTP.
status.push_alert_step2: Grant the browser permission when prompted

chat.title: Chat notifications
chat.help: Receive notifications for new chat messages

calendar.title: Calendar notifications
calendar.reminders_help: Choose when you'd like to be reminded:

js.toast_push_denied_message: You can enable notifications in the browser settings.
js.toast_mic_enabled_message: You can now record voice messages.
js.toast_mic_denied_message: Microphone access is required for voice messages.

about.heading: About Prismateams
about.section_product_description: Prismateams is a comprehensive team collaboration platform that helps you communicate, organise and cooperate efficiently with your team. It offers chat, file management, calendar, email management and much more.
about.copyright: Copyright Â© Enrico R. Matzke 2025. All rights reserved.
about.section_repository_description: You can find the source code repository on GitHub:
about.section_repository_improvement_note: The software is continuously being improved and developed. If you discover a bug, please report it with a screenshot and/or detailed description via the Issues page on GitHub.

admin_modules.heading: Manage Modules
admin_modules.description: Enable or disable modules for all users. Disabled modules will be hidden in the navigation.

users.heading: User Management
users.flash_unauthorized: Only administrators have access to this page.

whitelist.title: Whitelist management
whitelist.description: Manage email addresses and domains for automatic activation

email_footer.title: Email footer
email_footer.description: Configure the email footer template with variables

file_settings.title: File Settings
file_settings.description: Enable or disable mailboxes and shares

file_settings.heading: File Settings
file_settings.dropbox_help: Allows creating mailboxes (upload-only folders) for bookings and other purposes.
file_settings.sharing_help: Allows creating shared folders for bookings and other purposes.
file_settings.flash_unauthorized: Only administrators have access to this page.

system.heading: System Settings
system.portal_name_help: The name of the portal that is displayed in various places.
system.portal_logo_help: Logo for the portal (PNG, JPG, JPEG, GIF or SVG, max. 5MB)

booking_forms.flash_unauthorized: Only administrators have access to this page.
